ejapaye pawathmata adala bhauthika pasubima hakili yama nisa kuda thiruwakata sima wenna me anuwa ejapayata sidda wela thiyenawa.athishaya konsarwatiw ihala panthikayan ha sulu jathika piris harunama ejapaya samaga ithiri wi sitinne kapuwath kola wignyanayak thiyena gambada ahinsaka yu en pi karayan witharayi.pawathina drushtiwadaya magin meheyawena me ayagenuth wishala kotasak thamanta mona monawa hari labena jayagrahi rajapaksha pila samaga danatamath ekathu wela thiyenne sada parajitha pakshayakin thamange lamayekta rassawakwath labaganna idak labenne nathi nisa.rajapaksha sarthakawa pawathina samaja kramaya aaraksha karana tharamata samaja kramaya pawathwa gena yanna shrilanipaya wenuwata wikalpayak sadaha bhauthika awashyathawayak mathuwenne naha.me nisa ejapayata - ehi nayakaya wikramasinha wuwath,premadasa wuwath,karu wuwath wena kawareku wuwath ( ara tharam janapriya paba akki ejapa nayakaya wunath )rajapaksha (la) sarthakawa bat karana thuru bench ekata wi innata siduwima aniwaryayak.
